channel.title: domain on Classroom
channel.description: Recent content in domain on Classroom

item.title: Domain Enumeration Cheat Sheet
item.description: Get all the member of the Domain Admins Group Get-NetGroupMember -GroupName "Domain Admins" or ActiveDirectory module Get-ADGroupMember -Identity "Domain Admins" -Recursive Get the group membership for a user Get-NetGroup -UserName "labuser" or ActiveDirectory module Get_ADPrincipalGroupMembership -Identity labuser Get all computers of the domain Get-NetComputer (-FullData) Using ActiveDirectory module Get-ADComputer -Filter * | select Name Get-ADComputer -Filter * -Properties * Find all machines on the current domain where the current user has local admin access Find-LocalAdminAccess -Verbose
